overview: Marie, who was orphaned as a young girl, has a case of arrested development that makes her act younger than her age.  One day she stops to look in a store window displaying various ornate dolls.  Claude, the affluent, eccentric store owner, sees her and becomes infatuated which leads to her and him meeting and deciding to go and take a look at Claude personal doll collection at his house.  Marie, unaware of Claude's bizarre obsession with dolls, decides to marry him.
title: Marie, the Doll
